Facial Recognition¶

Recognize¶

facial_recognition.recognize.recognize()[source]¶

Open picamera and use the trained model to recognize the

customer.

Returns

  • username, or label of the recognized person.

  • ’unknown’ if the person is not recognized.

Train model¶

facial_recognition.train_model.train_model(encodings_data)[source]¶

Train the SVM model using face encodings got from

MP

Args

encoding_data : encodings.pickle got updated from MP

Returns

  • username if sucessfully authenticated.

  • empty string otherwise.
